snippet: Luna Rossa of Italy rolled over Artemis Racing rounding the first mark and sped away to victory to take a 2-0 lead in the America’s Cup challenger trials on San Francisco Bay.
abstract: Italy takes 2-0 lead in America's Cup challenger trials on San Francisco Bay.
lead_paragraph: Luna Rossa of Italy rolled over Artemis Racing rounding the first mark and sped away to victory to take a 2-0 lead in the America’s Cup challenger trials on San Francisco Bay.

headline.main: Italian Boat Wins Again in Challenger Trials
headline.print_headline: Italian Boat Wins Again in Challenger Trials
